item.title: iOS 26: Fine-Tune Podcast Playback Speeds
item.description: With iOS 26 (currently in beta), Apple has finally caught up with rival podcast apps like Overcast by adding more fine-grained playback speed controls to the Podcasts app. While competitors have long
